item.title: Analyze Chase H1B Data
item.description: Intro Web Scraping Overall EDA Q1: What’s the Top 10 Companies that filed the most H1B application? Q2: Is there a trend that more or more H1B filed in later years? Chase Only Data Cleaning Q2: How Job Level changes over time? Q3: What Job Function has the least gap between Analyst and Management? Q4: How Median Salary Increases over Year? Q5a: How is the salary distributed on the Job Function related to my background?

item.title: Moving Files Around In R
item.description: Intro Creating 24 folders with similar naming patterns Change Code content and move to desired location Run same UNIX command on different directory Convert xls to xlsx Takeaway Intro Recently, I have a project requires some automation. By googling and reading answers on StackOverFlow, I learned quite a lot, I think it’s better to document these little tricks here. The automation can be decomposed into below operations:
